product information:
Get the AccuTouch 1537L LCD monitor and enjoy the touchscreen benefit, which is incorporated with a watertight 0.5 mm seal mini bezel that enhances its look. The 15-inch widescreen display of this Tyco Electronics touch monitor gives a native resolution of 1024x768 pixels that offer exceptional picture quality and clearer moving images. This Tyco Electronics 15-inch monitor features 3mm SecureTouch glass touch sensor, which is chemically strengthened for regular usage. The AccuTouch 1537L is sleek and compact with thin borders, while the multiple mounting options provide great convenience. This Tyco Electronics 15-inch monitor comes with multilingual display, wherein you can choose your preferred language. With a contrast ratio of 500:1, this Tyco Electronics touch monitor provides sharp, crisp images.
